string.name: notifying_service_controller
string.b: This service will update a status bar notification every 15 seconds for a minute

resources.string: Specify the partner profile: This will help others to have some idea of what you want. Please fill all the fields that are an absolutely must and desirable.
If your expected Dream-mate profile found then you will receive notification every 10 seconds.
Dream mate found! Ready to chat now.

string.name: help
string.b: Need to find your dreamdate on your mobile? Follow these steps.

resources.string: Your Profile : First you need to fill your profile and this profile might be communicated to the matches if you wish so.

Dream-date Profile: You must fill out a dream-date profile. This the kind of profile that you request for dating. More than 1 dream-date profile can be stored, and the Dating application will store this in your device locally. This information will also send to the Dating server.

Service : Dating service runs in the background looking for dating matches for you. The service also listens for incoming messages from the Dating server and uses an appropriate notification service to inform you.

Alerts : A Dating notifier will run along with the Dating service. This notifier will alert you of all dating matches found. The dating alert will specify Proximity and the Closeness of the Match. The Dating alert will use LBS, Maps and all kinds of locational api's to interact with you.

Interaction : You can interact with the matches in your own way. You can select one or more matches and communicate with the match in an anonymous way. You can save all the matching profiles in your mobile device locally for future communication. Also you can delete this matching information at anytime.

Location Broadcast : The dating service will be broadcasting your locations to the dating server when you are on move. This location information need not be sent, if you don't want. The polling interval can be set by you to broadcast your location every 5 minutes and you can also totally turn off this feature.
